Package com.viaoa.ds.jdbc.db

OADataSourceJDBC classes used for ORM - object-relational mapping, and DB metadata.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DataAccessObject Used for populated OAObject properties with resultSet data.
 

Class Summary
Column Used for mapping database Columns with OAObject properties.
DataAccessObject.ResultSetInfo  
Database Used for defining a Database for OADataSourceJDBC.
DBMetaData Database MetaData for various JDBC databases.
Index Defines indexes for JDBC databases.
Link Used for defining relationships between tables.
Table Used for mapping database Tables with OAObjects.
 

Package com.viaoa.ds.jdbc.db Description

OADataSourceJDBC classes used for ORM - object-relational mapping, and DB metadata.
